00022 #include <stdio.h>
00023 #include "midas.h"
00024 
00025 
00026 void process_event(HNDLE hBuf, HNDLE request_id, EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *pevent)
00027 {
00028    printf("Received event #%d\r", pheader->serial_number);
00029 }
00030 
00031 main()
00032 {
00033    INT status, request_id;
00034    HNDLE hBufEvent;
00035 
00036    status = cm_connect_experiment("", "sample", "Simple Analyzer", NULL);
00037    if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
00038       return 1;
00039 
00040    bm_open_buffer("SYSTEM", EVENT_BUFFER_SIZE, &hBufEvent);
00041    bm_request_event(hBufEvent, 1, TRIGGER_ALL, GET_ALL, &request_id, process_event);
00042 
00043    do {
00044       status = cm_yield(1000);
00045    } while (status != RPC_SHUTDOWN && status != SS_ABORT);
00046 
00047    cm_disconnect_experiment();
00048 
00049    return 0;
00050 }
